snippet: Minnesota capitalized on an error by Boston pitcher John Lackey to beat the Red Sox, who fell from first for the first time this season.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Minnesota Twins defeat Boston Red Sox, 5-3; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Minnesota capitalized on an error by Boston pitcher John Lackey to beat the Red Sox, who fell from first for the first time this season.

headline.seo: Red Sox Fall to Twins and Out of First Place
headline.main: Red Sox Fall to Twins and Out of First Place
headline.print_headline: Twins Beat Struggling Red Sox, Who Fall Out of First Place
